alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 3:27AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Benton and northwestern Carroll Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 327 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northeast of Pea Ridge, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Rogers... Bentonville... Eureka Springs... Bella Vista... Pea Ridge... Garfield... Gateway... Beaver... War Eagle... Avoca... Hill Top... Beaver Lake... Walnut Hill... Monte Ne... Larue... Oak Hill... Busch... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 87 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
